item.description:
Come enjoy this beautiful day in the vibrant South End! Start with the scrumptious Sunday Brunch at The Gaslight; choose from the $9.95 (tax & gratuity excluded) Prix Fixe menu or be adventurious and choose from the many other entrees..... ...and then plan to spend some time at the famous SOWA markets where approx 100 vendors of quality crafts, jewlery, clothing, arts & crafts, preserves, fresh food, farmer's market, antiques, and so much more. Plan to lunch at one of the many (again famous) food vans or have a coffee/tea at the cozy cafe at Mohr McFerson.

Parking adjacent to the restaurant.

Guests pay server directly, Paypal is NOT available for this event.

Please RSVP by June 20th!
item.how_to_find_us: We meet at the bar and then sit in our own section
item.name: Sunday Brunch & More!
